PSL @ ACM/SIGAPP Symposium On Applied Computing

Pau, France â€¢ Apr 9, 2018 - Apr 13, 2018

Our group presented works on choreographic programming and muicroservice programming at the 33rd ACM/SIGAPP Symposium On Applied Computing. Marco Peressotti gave a talk about communication abstractions in concurrent programming and Janine Weber presented a poster about patterns for failure handling in microservice programming.

The Programming, Logics, and Systems Group website is supported and hosted by the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science of the University of Southern Denmark.
